about_the_game:
Written by the team that created Firmament, the Firmament Digital Strategy Guide is the perfect companion to help you get the most out of Cyan World’s latest puzzle-adventure game! This guide provides you with a complete walkthrough, so you can discover every hidden detail and unlock every mystery.

Even the most astute players can get stuck on a particularly challenging puzzle. For those “impossibly stuck!” moments, the strategy guide includes hints as well as complete puzzle solutions to help you get back on track without having to resort to searching the internet, or spending weeks in head-scratching frustration.

Don't miss out on this essential companion to Firmament from Cyan Worlds. Get your copy today!
